title: Flex'em Wreck'em
detail: Play Rock'em Sock'em with your entire body. Flex to punch and move around to dodge.
extended_details: Play Rock'em Sock'em with your entire body. Muscle sensors are used to read electrical impulses in each bicep and are used to activate a motor that pushes down the original game's punching mechanism. An accelerometer is worn as a hat and gather's movement data. This movement data is translated into the rotational and linear motion of the original game's robots.
